TEXT.S:
= José Mário Vaz (··) = Mntucing hngkawas 1957 idas 12 jiyax 10 ka José Mário Vaz ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Guinea-bissau ta sayang o kiya ka José Mário Vaz, pnaah hngkawas 2014 idas 6 jiyax 23 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
= José Mário Vaz (··) = José Mário Vaz (Kari Budoya: José Mário Vaz, kngkawas 1957 idas 12 diyax 10-), Guinea Bissau seyjicya, mnsoto Guinea Bissau.
